Reviews.Title: Great Deal for an Amateur
Reviews.Author: Thuendermans
Reviews.Content: Finally getting some lenses for my P7000 (functional with these lenses if you get the Lens / Filter Adapter tube (the one from A&R; PHOTO VIDEO INC works fine, better than the nikon as it's longer and allows you to still use your zoom.)These come in great little bags, good if you don't have the perfect bag set up yet. There is some tunneling on the P7000 due to the length of the tube that allows it to take the lens, but the photo quality is worth the slightly smaller area. The wide angle shots are lovely and the sharpness using the telephoto is better than I've ever gotten out of my camera without it. Then again, I'm studying the camera functions so it might just be that my skills are getting better, but it sure seems like the lens really helps you get close without getting in your subject's face.I'd give it 5 stars, but I really don't know enough about photography yet to comfortably give that strong an endorsement. That's said, I'd heartily recommenced this for other amateur photo enthusiasts.
